hcc_text: Pelham Parkway South is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top third for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in the Bronx)
info: At Pelham Parkway South at Pelham Parkway Eb, Bx River Parkway Nb Exit 7 East and Boston Road, there were 2 severe injuries in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Pelham Parkway South at Pelham Parkway Eb, Bx River Parkway Nb Exit 7 East and Boston Road
